alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Custer; Garfield; Logan; Loup; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 11:45AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Loup, northeastern Logan, southwestern Garfield, northern Custer, southern Blaine and southeastern Thomas Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1144 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking multiple strong thunderstorms near a line extending from 11 miles south of Halsey to 13 miles south of Dunning to 8 miles southwest of Anselmo. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Broken Bow, Burwell, Taylor, Sargent, Merna, Anselmo, Dunning, Comstock, Victoria Springs State Recreation Area, Weissert, Westerville, Lillian, Milburn, Milburn Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area, Walworth, Kent Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area, Round Valley, Arcadia Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area, Wescott and Linscott. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 95 and 128. Highway 2 between mile markers 232 and 281. Highway 92 between mile markers 255 and 273. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in North Platte.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Custer; Garfield; Logan; Loup; Thomas
